name: @tsdotnet/compare
description: Utility for common comparison functions including sorting and type reflection.
author: electricessence

scripts.build:dist: rimraf dist/* && copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.d.ts dist && tsc
scripts.bump: npm run precommit && npm version patch
scripts.bump-minor: npm run precommit && npm version minor
scripts.docs: rimraf docs/* && rimraf docs/.nojekyll && typedoc --options typedoc.json --readme none && node ./.build/create-nojekyll.js
scripts.precommit: npm i && run-p lint test && run-p build:* && npm run validate
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && run-p validate test
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm run docs && git commit -m "Updated docs." docs && git push
